psi

Class PsiServerKeyDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • psi.PsiServerKeyDescription
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, PsiKeyDescription

    public class PsiServerKeyDescription
extends java.lang.Object
implements PsiKeyDescription, java.io.Serializable
    Contains the variables used by the server to perform encryption operations. The set of variables is a superset of the ones required by each psi implementation. In particular:
    • DH uses modulus, generator and privateExponent (the modulus and the generator are sent to the client)
    • BS uses modulus, privateExponent and publicExponent (the modulus and the publicExponent are sent to the client)
    • ECDH uses ecPrivateD
    • ECBS uses ecPrivateD and ecPublicQ (the ecPublicQ is sent to the client)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
